JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you have technical flair, and do you thrive on developing, improving, and optimizing equipment? Do you want be part of an international growth organisation that supplies zero-emission hydrogen for the European mobility market?

Birn+Partners is looking for an Operation Technician in Holland for our customer Everfuel.

Installation, Commissioning, Operation and Maintenance of Hydrogen Fuelling Stations

As an Operations Technician at Everfuel, you will be responsible for installation, commissioning, operation, and maintenance of hydrogen fuelling stations, hydrogen trailers, and electrolysers all over Europe, starting with new hydrogen fuelling station placed in Heinenoord.

It will be your responsibility to ensure that the customers can fuel their vehicles when they need to, by making sure that all assets are available 24/7.

You will be responsible for highly sophisticated equipment consisting of software, electronics, pneumatic, mechanical, process, and cooling elements. Therefore, it is important that you are a fast learner as we do not expect you to be proficient in all areas from the beginning.

As hydrogen is under high pressure it is extremely important that you have a good mindset for safety and never compromise that.

You will report to the Operations Manager of Everfuel in Fredericia, Denmark. You will be part of an ever-growing international team of motivated people who are dedicated to make green hydrogen for transportation a competitive alternative to fossil fuels. You will have one local Dutch colleague when you start, but the organisation is expected to grow.

Your tasks will include:
  • Documenting potential failures and quality issues, which includes providing feedback to the responsible manager/engineer
  • Supporting colleagues in your areas of expertise
  • Suggesting and implementing improvements to installing, operating and maintaining our equipment, as well as our processes
  • Helping customers on site to operate the fuelling equipment
Skilled Technician with Experience in Installation and Service of Complex Machinery

You hold a relevant educational background and experience in installation, commissioning, service, and maintenance of complex machines or plants. You have a strong, technical orientated mindset, are curious, and can quickly understand complex technical systems to find potential technical failures, quality issues, and solutions.

You are structured, consistent, and clear with documentation, and follow work procedures safely and efficiently. As a person, you are dedicated to your job, and you want to make a difference in the world by working with a company that wants to make green transportation possible. Furthermore, you are proficient in both written and spoken English.

Moreover, we imagine that you have:
  • Experience working within established service procedures, instructions, bill of materials, and norms
  • Good knowledge in the remote operation and monitoring of complex systems
  • The ability to consistently maintain an organized and clean work area in the workshop and onsite
  • Willingness to travel.
Everfuel

Everfuel is the new fuel company in Europe – providing green hydrogen for larger vehicle fleets like buses, trucks, and taxies. Everfuel provides the missing link between renewable energy and green transportation as a partner, owner, and operator of PtX plants, hydrogen distribution, and hydrogen fueling stations. They are situated at the Everfuel Farm, near Herning, Denmark, and in Fredericia where they are building Europe’s, so far, largest Electrolyser plant and new attractive offices.

Everfuel recently opened the first Dutch Everfuel hydrogen fuelling station in Heinenoord.

See more here: https://www.everfuel.com/projects/fuel-cell-buses-in-the-netherlands-2/

The position will be perfect for you if you enjoy working in a dynamic and flat organization. Everyone is equally vital at Everfuel.

Do you want to make an impact on the future?

- Then submit your CV today and become the next Everfueller!
